page.title: 20FRODSHAM CARNIVAL
page.content: FRODSHAM CARNIVAL IS AN ANNUAL EVENT FIRST RECORDED IN 1924 TO RAISE FUNDS FOR THE CRICKET CLUB.ALTHOUGH IT HAS NOT BEEN HELD EVERY YEAR SINCE THEN IT IS NOW ENTERING ITS 17th CONTINUOUS RUN.THE CARNIVAL IS A PARADE AND EVENTS HELD ON THE FIELD WHICH INCLUDES SPORTS,BOWLS,DISCO AND A CHILDRENS COLOURING COMPETITION. A CARNIVAL QUEEN IS SELECTED FROM THE AREA EVERY YEAR AND SHE PERFORMS THE OPENING CEROMONY ON CARNIVAL DAY,TAKES PART IN THE PARADE AND THEN GIVES PRIZES AND TROPHIES TO THE VARIOUS EVENTS.THE PARADE STARTS FROM QUEENSWAY AND PROCESSES ALONG MAIN STREET,CHURCH STREET AND FLUIN LANE ENDING AT THE COMMUNITY CENTRE. THE LARGEST PARADE IN RECENT YEARS HAD 100 FLOATS AND STRETCHED FOR A MILE.INCLUDED IN THE PARADE ARE FLOATS,BANDS AND DANCERS.
